Articles.Content:
I discovered this game through the minecraft forums, and it has became my new favorite. I\'ve been trying to pre-order...but I keep hitting problems.. :[

I\'ve been playing for a few weeks now. And TODAY... I FINALLY GOT TO THE MUN! *spaz*

Well...Kinda... I got to the mun... But at the speed of 650 m/s with no fuel :/ . Yeah...

But anyway, I hope to watch and enjoy this game as it grows into it\'s hopefully amazing final stages.

Does anyone have any music that is good to play with the game? XD

Lock

KAAR Facility

(Kerbin Advanced Aerospace Research)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Deadly Launching!

Spammm!

Capt\'n Spambot

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Deadly Launching!

Spammm!

Capt\'n Spambot

Don\'t you dare do that again

Also. Welcome to our dysfunctional forums. You have meet on of the local trolls, imitating a admin.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Minecraft, another wonderful indie game by another wonderful developer. I\'d go play it now, in fact, but I\'m too busy destroying absurdly oversized rockets.

I\'d also give you a warm welcome, but I\'m in no position since I just got here myself. But I can wish you happy launchings. And remember, failure is Fun.

As for music, I imagine putting Tchaikovsky\'s 1812 overture to a montage of spectacular failures would be appropriate.
